oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some New Classes of Generalized Difference Strongly Summable. n-Normed Sequence Spaces Defined by Ideal Convergence and Orlicz Function
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KILICMAN, A
BORGOHAIN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study some new generalized difference strongly summable n-normed sequence spaces using ideal convergence and an Orlicz function in connection with de la Vallee Poussin mean. We give some relations related to these sequence spaces also.
